title: ICAI Further Postpones CA Intermediate Auditing & Ethics Paper (Scheduled 19 January 2026)
content:
# ICAI Further Postpones CA Intermediate Auditing & Ethics Paper (Scheduled 19 January 2026)

Ek important update hai CA Intermediate students ke liye. The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne **Auditing & Ethics (Paper 5)** ke exam ko, jo pehle 19 January 2026 (Monday) ko schedule kiya gaya tha, further postpone karne ka announce kiya hai.

Yeh announcement 17 January 2026 ko release kiya gaya hai.

*   **Old Exam Date:** Originally, Paper 5 (Auditing & Ethics) was scheduled for 15th January 2026. It was then re-scheduled to 19th January 2026 due to Municipal Corporation elections in Maharashtra.
*   **Postponed Date:** The exam scheduled for **19th January 2026 (Monday)** now stands postponed.
*   **New Exam Date:** The revised date for this paper will be **announced in due course**.
*   **Reason for Postponement:** The decision has been taken due to "unavoidable circumstances."
*   **Applicability:** This postponement applies to all examination centres across India and abroad.
*   **Other Papers:** ICAI ne clarify kiya hai ki January 2026 session ke baaki papers ke schedule mein koi badlav nahi hai. Sabhi other examinations apne existing timetable ke according hi conduct kiye jaayenge.

Candidates ko advise kiya jaata hai ki latest updates ke liye ICAI ki official website regular check karte rahein.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/post/examination-announcement)

*Published on: 17 January 2026*
